scripts.install: npm install --prefix ../ eslint --save-dev && npm install --prefix ../ eslint-plugin-import-helpers --save-dev && npm install --prefix ../ eslint-plugin-react-hooks --save-dev && npm i --prefix ../ eslint-config-standard-with-typescript --save-dev && cd .. && eslint --init
scripts.install-other: npm install --prefix ../  eslint --save-dev && npm install --prefix ../  eslint-plugin-import-helpers --save-dev && npm install --prefix ../ eslint-plugin-import-helpers --save-dev && npm i --prefix ../ eslint-config-standard-with-typescript --save-dev && npm install --prefix ../ eslint-plugin-react-hooks --save-dev && cd .. && npm init @eslint/config
